stateCompliance.headline: Understanding California Cash Advance Laws in Fresno
stateCompliance.content: Fresno County residents are protected by California's strict consumer lending regulations. The DFPI regulates all payday lenders.
keyPoints: Maximum loan amount is $300 including all fees
Maximum fee is 15% of check amount (460% APR typical)
Only one loan at a time - no rollovers
Lion Cash Advance is DFPI licensed and compliant
One $15 NSF fee maximum per check
All disclosures in your preferred language
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for educational purposes. California cash advance laws may change. For current information, contact the DFPI at 1-866-275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov. Consult a California attorney for specific legal questions.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Central Valley Communities
nearbyLocations.intro: Need a location closer to you? We serve these nearby Fresno area cities:

faq.question: Where is your Fresno location?
faq.answer: We're at 890 Olive Avenue, Suite 120, near the Fresno Chaffee Zoo and Tower District. Take CA-99 to Exit 130 toward Olive Avenue. Easy parking available.

faq.question: How quick is the process in Fresno?
faq.answer: Typically 30-45 minutes from application to funding. Bring your valid ID, proof of income, and checking account information for same-day approval.

faq.question: What's the maximum I can borrow in California?
faq.answer: California law limits loans to $300 including fees. With the standard 15% fee, you can typically borrow up to $255.

faq.question: How much are your fees?
faq.answer: California caps fees at 15% of the check amount. A $200 loan costs $30 in fees. A $255 loan costs the maximum $45 fee.

faq.question: Is Lion Cash Advance properly licensed?
faq.answer: Yes, we are fully licensed by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation. Verify at dfpi.ca.gov/regulated-industries/regulated-entities-list/
